body: Relax between citrus trees, stone walls, and the scent of the Mediterranean scrub.
We prepared guides, tips, and thoughtful touches so you can experience Ostuni like a local.

rules.title: Quiet hours after 10:30 PM
rules.details: Sound travels across the terraces—keep voices and music low late at night.

rules.title: Pool care
rules.details: Rinse feet before entering and cover the pool on windy nights.

wifi.shareNote: The QR code in the kitchen connects devices instantly.
instructions: Main router is next to the living room bookshelf.
If the terrace signal drops, switch on the portable repeater.

discover.note: Evenings are perfect for aperitivo on the terrace.
Pack the lightweight umbrella from the mudroom.

contacts.name: European emergency number
contacts.notes: Already saved in the phone app favorites.

guidelines.label: General
guidelines.title: Thermostat
guidelines.description: Keep set to 22°C/72°F for comfort. Turn off when opening windows or leaving for extended periods.

guidelines.label: General
guidelines.title: Water Heater
guidelines.description: If hot water runs out, wait 30 minutes for tanks to reheat. Reset switch lives in the utility closet.

welcome.greeting: Hello from the house of lemons
body: Bring Puglia's slow rhythm with you.
Use the dashboard to update experiences, contacts, and handoffs for the on-site team.

rules.title: Retractable awnings
rules.details: Close them when wind exceeds 25 km/h to avoid damage.

rules.title: Vintage glassware
rules.details: Use the gentle dishwasher cycle and dry by hand.

wifi.shareNote: Mesh routers cover both floors of the house.
instructions: Quick reset: hold the side button for 5 seconds.
Report outages in the #tech-support Slack channel.

discover.note: Reserve the terrace table; sunsets are unreal.
